# Marketing report structure part 2

In this second report you are going to use data from `bike_sales` as a second step to complete the 2 tasks by:

-   Exploring the relation between variables of the same type

-   Calculating descriptive statistics by different groups

-   Apply statistical tests to identify differences between groups

Use the template `002_marketing_report_part-2.qmd` to build the marketing report. You can find the template to use in 2 locations. Choose the option of your preference:
